overview: As a final attempt to salvage their dysfunctional marriage, Hayley and James begrudgingly spend a weekend in a designated house under their therapist's orders.The almost labyrinthine house's doorways lead the couple to mysterious and sexy strangers with both husband and wife finding themselves entranced and tempted by what they see, spawning feelings of jealousy and resentment. Will a weekend in this curious home save Hayley and James' marriage, or tear it apart?
title: House of Temptation
